name: FriendShips
description:
Grab your best friend and two gamepads, because FriendShips is here! FriendShips is a local multiplayer single stick shooter, a fight to the death, and all around good time.

Left stick - steer your ship

A - accelerate

Right trigger - shoot

Only player 1 can navigate the menu (with the D-pad).

Powerups spawn randomly. If you get shot down, don't worry! You can still go for a sweet draw by crashing your exploding ship into your enemy!
